title:

items.title: Our Advisors
items.text: Drawing from over a century of combined experience in finance, these professionals have navigated roles spanning entrepreneurship, hedge fund management, and portfolio oversight. With backgrounds in leading technology platforms and managing multi-billion-dollar funds, their expertise spans financial advisory, investment banking, and trading, honed at prestigious institutions like Morgan Stanley and Merrill Lynch. Together, they offer a multifaceted perspective on financial intricacies, backed by decades of successful navigation.

Pat Mulvey
Joe Pastore
Eric Colon
Mathew August
